UPDATE dayoff_count dc INNER JOIN dayoff d ON dc.emp_code = d.emp_code SET used_cnt = CASE WHEN #{off_code} = 2 THEN used_cnt WHEN #{off_code} = 5 THEN used_cnt + 0.5 * (DATEDIFF(end_date,start_date) + 1) ELSE used_cnt + 1 * (DATEDIFF(end_date,start_date) + 1) END, remain_cnt = CASE WHEN #{off_code} = 2 THEN remain_cnt WHEN #{off_code} = 5 THEN remain_cnt - 0.5 * (DATEDIFF(end_date,start_date) + 1) ELSE remain_cnt - 1 * (DATEDIFF(end_date,start_date) + 1) END WHERE dc.emp_code = #{emp_code} AND d.start_date = #{start_date}
